analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol#138-139) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol#143-145)

Reentrancy in NaviCrowdSale.generate (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol#415-435):
	External calls:
	- crowdsaleToken.issue(_recepient,_value) (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol#426-428)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol)

Reentrancy in NaviCrowdSale.generate (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol#415-435):
	External calls:
	- crowdsaleToken.issue(_recepient,_value) (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol#426-428)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participants (/unique_chucks/20/0x93aa3cb755eac961dd4767ce7cb3d5c6a65fdb7c.sol)
